summary: REQ-26 appears implemented by centralizing the logo path in `frontend/src/branding/theme.ts` and consuming it from `frontend/src/components/Logo.tsx` with appropriate alt text and sizing. However, REQ-24 (adding the actual JPG file under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`) is not shown in the diff summary (no added files), so the static asset availability requirement is missing based on provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded image file (1000795148-1.jpg) under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and ensure it is available at runtime via /assets/generated/1000795148-1.jpg.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, and there is no evidence that `frontend/public/assets/generated/1000795148-1.jpg` was added to the repo.

hallucinated_features.description: Logo image load error handling with React state and a fallback text/initials logo when the image fails to load.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to display the uploaded logo and centralize the path; it does not request implementing an onError fallback UI for the logo.
